name: Google Calendar
short_description: Manage your calendar events and schedules efficiently.
title: Google Calendar MCP Server
description: The Google Calendar MCP server helps your AI agents manage your calendar. It can create events, update schedules, and handle all your calendar tasks automatically.

total_tools.name: Add Attendee(s) to Event
total_tools.description: Invites one or more person to an existing event.

mcp_content.heading: Manage Event Attendees Effortlessly
mcp_content.description: Add people to your calendar events easily. Just tell your AI who to invite, and it will send all the invitations for you.

mcp_content.heading: How to Create and Organize New Calendars?
mcp_content.description: Make new calendars for different needs with Google Calendar MCP. Your AI helps you set up and organize them without any extra work.

mcp_content.heading: Remove Unwanted Calendar Events
mcp_content.description: Keep your calendar tidy by removing events you don't need anymore. Your AI helps you delete events and keep everything organized.

total_tools.name: Create Detailed Event
total_tools.description: Create an event by defining each field.

mcp_content.heading: How to Create Detailed Calendar Events?
mcp_content.description: Make complete calendar events with Google Calendar MCP. Your AI adds all the important details like time, place, and who's coming.

total_tools.name: Quick Add Event
total_tools.description: Create an event from a piece of text. Google parses the text for date, time, and description info.

mcp_content.heading: Add Events Using Natural Language
mcp_content.description: Just type what you want in normal words. Your AI reads it and creates the event with the right date, time, and details.

total_tools.name: API Request (Beta)
total_tools.description: This is an advanced action which makes a raw HTTP request that includes this integration's authentication.

mcp_content.heading: How to Access Advanced Calendar Features?
mcp_content.description: Use more powerful calendar features with Google Calendar MCP's API. Perfect for special tasks that need extra options.

total_tools.name: Find Event
total_tools.description: Finds an event in your calendar.

mcp_content.heading: Locate Specific Calendar Events
mcp_content.description: Find any event in your calendar quickly. Your AI can search using different details to find exactly what you're looking for.

total_tools.name: Find or Create Event
total_tools.description: Finds or creates a specific event v2.

mcp_content.heading: How to Prevent Duplicate Calendar Events?
mcp_content.description: Google Calendar MCP first checks if an event exists before making a new one. This keeps your calendar clean with no repeat events.

total_tools.name: Retrieve Event by ID
total_tools.description: Finds a specific event by its ID in your calendar.

mcp_content.heading: Access Specific Event Details
mcp_content.description: Look up any event using its ID number. Quick and easy way to check or update event information.

total_tools.name: Find Busy Periods in Calendar
total_tools.description: Finds busy time periods in your calendar for a specific timeframe.

mcp_content.heading: How to Check Calendar Availability?
mcp_content.description: See when you're busy or free. Google Calendar MCP helps you find open time slots for planning new meetings.

total_tools.name: Update Event
total_tools.description: Updates an event. Only filled fields are updated.

mcp_content.heading: Modify Existing Events
mcp_content.description: Change event details easily. Your AI updates only what you want to change and keeps everything else the same.

mcp_page_content.title: How Can Your AI Agents Use the Google Calendar MCP Server?
mcp_page_content.description: Make your schedule management easier with AI-powered calendar tools. Your AI assistant helps with everything from creating events to finding free time slots, so you can focus on what's important.
